text:
Carlos Lopez-Cantera (born December 29, 1973) is an American politician. He was the 19th Lieutenant Governor of Florida from February 3, 2014 to January 8, 2019. He is a member of the Republican Party.
On January 14, 2014, Governor Rick Scott announced López-Cantera's appointment to serve out the term of Jennifer Carroll, who resigned on March 12, 2013.
